extension.summary: The entire Marvel Cinematic Universe presented in chronological storytelling episode formats, including the movies, the TV shows, the one-shots, deleted scenes, and more!
extension.description: This is the entire Marvel Cinematic Universe (the movies, the SHIELD and other TV series, all the Marvel Netflix shows, the Marvel one-shots, the movie deleted and extended scenes, even the online promotional videos), all broken down into a chronological timeline order of events and presented as hour-long episodes. For a true Marvel fan, this is how the the MCU movies and TV shows were meant to be watched!
